abilities.name: UNRELENTING
abilities.description: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls.

flagship.name: C'Morran N'orr
abilities: Apply +1 to the result of each of your other ship's combat rolls in this system.

base.name: Tekklar Legion
base.effect: At the start of an invasion combat: Apply +1 to the result of each of your unit's combat rolls during this combat. If your opponent is the N'orr player, apply -1 to the result of each of their unit's combat rolls during this combat.
base.returnCondition: Then, return this card to the N'orr player.

base.name: T'ro
base.ability: At the end of a player's tactical action: You may exhaust this card; if you do, that player may place 2 infantry from their reinforcements on a planet they control in the active system

base.name: G'hom Sek'kus
base.ability: During the "Commit Ground Forces" step: you can commit up to 1 ground force from each planet in the active system and each planet in adjacent systems that do not contain 1 of your command tokens.

base.name: Sh'val, Harbinger
base.ability: After you move ships into the active system: You may skip directly to the "Commit Ground Forces" step. If you do, after you commit ground forces to land on planets, purge this card and return each of your ships in the active system to your reinforcements
